LanguageData.LotRE_MallornPlankFloor.label: mallorn-wood floor
LanguageData.LotRE_MallornPlankFloor.description: Wood plank flooring. For that warm, homey feeling. While it is easy to lay, it is also flammable.
LanguageData.LotRE_MallornPlankFloorTwo.label: mallorn-wood floor (bark)
LanguageData.LotRE_MallornPlankFloorTwo.description: Wood plank flooring. For that warm, homey feeling. While it is easy to lay, it is also flammable.
